greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of 1/(1 + x*Product_{k>=1} 1/(1 - x^k)).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..5000
maple: seq(coeff(series((1+x*mul((1-x^k)^(-1),k=1..n))^(-1),x,n+1), x, n), n = 0 .. 55); # _Muniru A Asiru_, Aug 30 2018
mathematica: nmax = 51; CoefficientList[Series[1/(1 + x Product[1/(1 - x^k), {k, 1, nmax}]), {x, 0, nmax}], x]
a[0] = 1; a[n_] := a[n] = -Sum[PartitionsP[k - 1] a[n - k], {k, 1, n}]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 51}]
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Aug 29 2018
